ygData.subject: Re: Looking for Glimpse and other Vision spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... In my (short) experience, the best spell library found so far is my home city of Felwithe, which has all the high level evacuate, gates and portals, as
ygData.messageBody:
According to Marziani, Michael D.:
> From: "Marziani, Michael D." <Michael.Marziani@...>
>
> Oh yeah sorry I forgot to actually answer your question in my previous
> email. I found the vision spells I have so far (glimpse, gaze, eye of zomm)
> in felwithe.

In my (short) experience, the best spell library found so far is my home city
of Felwithe, which has all the high level evacuate, gates and portals, as
well as most of the high level spells.

I seem to remember a site which was listing where each spell could be purchased,
but I've lost the reference...
